issue.title: Inserting a bad sdf model does not do anything, no console error/warnings.

content.html:
The TinyXML parser will silently stop parsing if an xml error is found. The following patch is an example for how to check for and print error messages.

diff -r 8be96422943a gazebo/sdf/interface/parser.cc
--- a/gazebo/sdf/interface/parser.cc    Tue Jan 29 01:33:08 2013 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/sdf/interface/parser.cc    Tue Jan 29 01:41:40 2013 -0800
@@ -330,6 +330,8 @@
 {
   TiXmlDocument xmlDoc;
   xmlDoc.Parse(_xmlString.c_str());
+  if (xmlDoc.Error())
+    gzerr << xmlDoc.ErrorDesc() << '\n';
   if (readDoc(&xmlDoc, _sdf, "data-string"))
     return true;
   else
